name: Variand
tagline: Variand, an Android app to make an analysis about heart rate variability
body:
### Description
Variand is an Android app that will let you make a specific graphic analysis about heart rate variability.
This app is intended to install and execute in an Android tablet and it was developed and designed  for 
researchers  or  clinical  professionals  without  requiring  special skills  in  computer  science.

In addition, Variand allows to:

* Load data from a .txt
* Show different graphics using this data
* Manipulate these graphics zooming and scrolling
* Apply different kind of filters over the signal
* Allows to  perform  both  spectral  and  nonlinear  analysis  of  several parameters  related  to  the  cardiac  rhythm
* Export the graphic to a .png or a .jpeg
* Sync with dropbox to upload and download documents and data
* Allows the management of the sdcard from the app

### Variand running in an Android tablet
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/jOhbTAU4OPI" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Jekyll makes it easy to create site-wide headers and footers without having to copy them across every page. It also offers intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features.
